title: Usage of Complementary Medicine in Switzerland: Results of t
author: Sabine D Klein; Loredana Torchetti; Martin Frei-Erb; Ursula Wolf
description: Background: Complementary medicine (CM) is popular in Switzerland. Several CM methods (traditional Chinese medicine/acupuncture, homeopathy, anthroposophic medicine, neural therapy, and herbal medicin
